subject: NCAA Soccer Championships
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Indiana won the N.C.A.A. men’s soccer championship, defeating Georgetown, 1-0, on Nikita Kotlov’s goal midway through the second half in Hoover, Ala.
snippet: Indiana won the N.C.A.A. men’s soccer championship, defeating Georgetown, 1-0, on Nikita Kotlov’s goal midway through the second half in Hoover, Ala.
